quote: So I was very proud of the policies we put forth. You know, I kept waiting for the moment -- I, you know, I've watched a million presidential debates in my life and I was waiting for the moment when one of the people asking the questions would have said, well, so exactly how are you going to create more jobs, right? ... I thought at some moment that would happen.
quotePlain: So I was very proud of the policies we put forth. You know, I kept waiting for the moment – I, you know, I’ve watched a million presidential debates in my life and I was waiting for the moment when one of the people asking the questions would have said, well, so exactly how are you going to create more jobs, right? … I thought at some moment that would happen.
name: Hillary Clinton
where: 2017 Women for Women International annual luncheon

checks.quote: But it did happen. Twice. Both Holt and Wallace devoted an extensive part of their debates to job creation and the economy. Trump told both moderators that he would create jobs by renegotiating trade deals, cutting regulations, reducing business taxes, and repatriating corporate cash held overseas.
checks.quotePlain: But it did happen. Twice. Both Holt and Wallace devoted an extensive part of their debates to job creation and the economy. Trump told both moderators that he would create jobs by renegotiating trade deals, cutting regulations, reducing business taxes, and repatriating corporate cash held overseas.

claims.title: debate moderators didn't ask Trump how he planned to create jobs
claims.negative: debate moderators asked Trump how he planned to create jobs
claims.negativePlain: debate moderators asked Trump how he planned to create jobs
claims.truth: They did in 2 of the 3 debates.
claims.truthPlain: They did in 2 of the 3 debates.
